reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater to be of good quality, with a true navy blue color and soft, nice fabric that's comfortable to wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the right length!
items.body: Lovely sweater, fits tts, soft and warm but not bulky. Color is accurate as shown. I have 3 sweaters from anrabess and all are very nice quality. My big plus was the length. I’m 5’7 and the sweater hits right over hip bones. So many tops/sweaters on Amazon are so long, I guess for you leggings gals, but I’m not into the French tuck thing and I’m really not into hiking up the back of my shirt to pee! Lol Read more
items.author: Kari

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice!
items.body: This is a great sweater! Light but not super lightweight, EXTREMELY soft, appears to be great quality. I was skeptical but thought I’d try. I’m normally a medium or small but got a medium in this and it’s nicely loose but not too big. The light grey is pretty. A little longer than expected but still nothing to complain about! Would definitely buy more. Read more
items.author: EMS

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and flattering
items.body: Fit as expected and comfortable. Dress it up or dress it down. Very versatile. Read more
items.author: Cloveless

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality - ODD FITTING
items.body: batwing/Dolman sleeve on a large side, size down Read more
items.author: Natalya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cozy, runs a bit large.
items.body: I bought this with very low expectations as I just needed it underneath my Halloween costume to keep me warm. It turned out to be a really nice sweater that I’ll wear again. I thought it ran a little large. However if you carry more weight on top you should go with your normal size. If you carry more weight on the bottom I would size down. I’m a pretty true to size L and wear a 10-12… I would definitely get a medium if I bought this again. But now it’s a roomy sweater I could easily wear something under it. Super soft. Don’t dry it… it’s part acrylic so it would likely ruin the fabric and cause pilling. It dried on its own in less than hour. Read more
items.author: Kristina Stoural

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits amazing
items.body: Great sweater got the wrong size but it worked out in my favor.. wanted a medium but ordered a small Read more
items.author: Maxine Hurdle

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars DISAPPOINTING EXPERIENCE
items.body: When I received this item, I will thrilled! It was GORGEOUS! Perfect fit, style and the color was amazing. I was just about to order all the colors when I decided to wear it first and then place another order. After one day of wear, this sweater had EXTREME pilling under the arms and the sides of the body of the sweater. Also there was pilling across the chest. It’s not like I did hard labor in the sweater either. I had a normal day. Food shopping, working at the computer, heating up dinner. I am SO DISAPPOINTED!! Read more
items.author: Rebekah J Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality,soft and rich color!
items.body: So happy with this purchase! Beautiful color,great quality and it feels so soft. I’m usually size Medium,but decided to go with Large to have this oversized look. It fits perfectly ! I’m going to order another color! Read more
items.author: M. Paw

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Forest Green, Nutmeg, Dark Grey, Hot Pink, Black, Grey Khaki, Navy Blue, Brick Red, Red, Deep Taupe, Almond, White, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
